title: fancy wedding script help!
content:
I tried using WhatTheFont! and it came up with Old Fashion Script & Flemish; however, after looking at all the characters it's not either of those. Any help in identifying is appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804020334im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1200_pixels_5411.jpg)
author: LaMalfa

comments.content: It's **[Bickham Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804020334/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/bickham-script-mm/)** but take a look at the alternate glyphs for /C /h etc.
